abstract: Enable a smooth, continuous transition from the present day SST and SIC into the future.
context: Enable a smooth, continuous transition from the present day SST and SIC into the future.
citationDetail: Mizuta, R., Y. Adachi, S. Yukimoto, S. Kusunoki (2008), Estimation of the future distribution of sea surface temperature and sea ice using the CMIP3 multi-model ensemble mean, Tech. Rep. 56, 28 pp., Meteorol. Res. Inst., Tsukuba, Japan
title: Estimation of the future distribution of sea surface temperature and sea ice using the CMIP3 multi-model ensemble mean
